categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Slone was a male Human agent of the reconstituted Sith Empire's Imperial Intelligence who was stationed in the city of Sobrik on Balmorra during the Cold War.
Agent Slone first appeared as a NPC in Star Wars: The Old Republic, where he was part of a cut mission on the planet Balmorra that did not even make it into the game's conversation files.
